article.title: AnviCom Awarded DISA ENCORE II Task Order
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: AnviCom Incorporated, a wholly owned subsidiary of Command Information, has been awarded a task order by the Defense Information Technology Contracting Organization (DITCO) to provide support to the Washington Headquarters Services (WHS) Information Technology Management Directorate (ITMD). Under the terms of the task order, AnviCom will implement a Web-based performance dashboard solution.
